name: riddle_0
description: Give me food, and I will live; give me water, and I will die. What am I?

name: riddle_1
description: What is full of holes but can still hold water?

name: riddle_2
description: A farmer has 17 sheep and all but nine die. How many are left?

name: riddle_3
description: Mike is a butcher. He is 5’10” tall. What does he weigh?

name: riddle_4
description: John needs 13 bottles of water from the store. John can only carry 3 at a time. What's the minimum number of trips John needs to make to the store?

name: riddle_5
description: Finger is to Hand as Leaf is to:

name: riddle_6
description: Mary, who is sixteen years old, is four times as old as her brother. How old will Mary be when she is twice as old as her brother?

name: riddle_7
description: Which one of the five is least like the other four - Dog, Mouse, Lion, Snake, Elephant?

name: riddle_8
description: Book is to Reading as Fork is to:

name: riddle_9
description: Forest is to tree as tree is to:

name: riddle_10
description: At a conference, 12 members shook hands with each other before & after the meeting. How many total number of hand shakes occurred?

name: riddle_11
description: What has a mouth, but cannot eat; moves, but has no legs; and has a bank, but cannot put money in it?
